12 blasts from three sides huh. bad move for the ones on the left and right=
. OK hows this?

Razor Claw forced his way forward getting pummeled by the =
majority of the shots. He lept upward causing some of the shots from the si=
de to head toward the opposite bot. The bleeding raptor worked his way clos=
e enough to Wolveritron where future shots could hit either one. he slashed=
 at the bot with his clawed feat. "Fight for yourself coward your friends w=
ill have more than enough opportunities to die later, nows your turn. Do yo=
u here the Matrix calling you home?" The beast had lost it's mind or it wou=
ld have thought to hold still and use his forcefield instead of getting bea=
t upon in a three on one fight.

(Come on Dachande you afraid of a little s=
cratch?)

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: dachande 
  To: nbwrpg@ya=
hoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, February 21, 2001 9:16 AM
  Subject: Re: =
Dachande did you forget?


  I must have.
   
  ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus=
::
   
      They all fired their weapons at the raptor, and the were to th=
e front of him, the left and the right. Each 4 times.
    ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
    From: CYBERWOLF4 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent=
: Wednesday, February 21, 2001 11:54 AM
    Subject: Fw: Dachande did you f=
orget?


    heres the last post I have for the fight between Razor Claw an=
d Wolveritron.
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: CYBERWOLF4 
    =
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Monday, February 12, 2001 7:31 AM
   =
 Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


    Razor Claw glared at the three=
 opponents with hate in his eyes and drool dripping from his jaw. The rapto=
r no longer had control of his actions and wouldn't be stopped until justic=
e had been served. "You fear me." He states through a half closed mouth. 

=
    He looked back at his origional prey, "You fear me so much that you wil=
l not fight one on one." He took a few steps forward lowering his head to t=
he level of Wolveritron so they could look eye to eye. The anger and hatred=
 split the air as the two looked toward each other. The teeth of one and th=
e claws of the acused reflected in the light around. Two bots enter, one bo=
t leaves and if Razor Claw had his way the Wolverine in bot mode would be t=
he apetizer.


      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: dachande 
  =
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Sunday, February 11, 2001 6:30 =
AM
      Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


      ::Wolveritron/Eclips=
e/Ramus::
       
          "I fight you now, bubb" Wolveritron said. "Beca=
use you ticked me off."
          Eclipse transformed to his full out battl=
e mode, standing at nine feet tall. His claws extended to their full length=
, 5 inches. His teeth were gleaming, they were ready to have mech fluid on =
them.
          Ramus pulled his crossbow up and aimed it at Razor Claw.
  =
        "We're ready for ya," They said. They would not make the first move=
, though.
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: CYBERWOLF4 
 =
       To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Sunday, February 11, 2001 =
9:38 AM
        Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


        Razor Claw =
rolled out the busted windshield using the tuck and roll technique to avoid=
 excessive damage. 

        "You decide to fight after all I see." the rap=
tor yells in his rage. he charges forward biting at Wolveritron. "You fight=
 me now, after leaving your team to fight alone? I will kill you slowly."

=

          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: dachande 
        =
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Saturday, February 10, 2001 7=
:47 AM
          Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


          He is.
 =
          
          ::Wolveritron/Eclipse/Ramus::
           
            =
  His claws dropped from his hands. "Who said I'm lettin others fight for m=
e, Bub?"
              "Wolveritron, this is what he wants," Eclipse said, =
putting his hand out, holding Wolveritron back. "Don't give it to him."
   =
           "Don't tell me who I can fight," Wolveritron said.
             =
 Ramus pulled his energy crossbow out (He's a twin of Ramulus). "I have no =
problem giving him what he wants."
              He didn't fire though.
   =
